alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Gallatin; Jefferson; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 3:34AM MST until January 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Isolated snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches possible within heavier snow bands. * WHERE...Meagher, Broadwater, Gallatin, Jefferson and Central and Southern Lewis and Clark Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Gallatin; Jefferson; Meagher
